e-money.translation[1].definitions[0].de: money stored in electronic form, used to buy things on the Internet without using a credit card
e-money.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: E-cash is similar to the electronic fund transfers done between banks.
e-money.translation[1].definitions[1].de: money that is stored in electrical form on a smart card, used when buying things in a shop
e-money.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Like notes and coins, e-money can be used to pay for goods and services in shops, supermarkets and other locations.
